description: This file defines a singleton object FavoritesRepository that manages favorite restaurant and menu item IDs. It provides methods for initializing from persistent storage, toggling favorites, and exposing LiveData for observing favorite IDs.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the repository by loading persisted favorite IDs from storage.

methods.name: isRestaurantFavorited
methods.description: Checks if a specific restaurant ID is marked as a favorite.

methods.name: toggleRestaurantFavorite
methods.description: Toggles the favorite status of a specific restaurant ID and persists the change.

methods.name: isMenuItemFavorited
methods.description: Checks if a specific menu item ID is marked as a favorite.

methods.name: toggleMenuItemFavorite
methods.description: Toggles the favorite status of a menu item ID and persists the change.

methods.name: persistRestaurants
methods.description: Persists the current list of favorite restaurant IDs to storage.

methods.name: persistMenuItems
methods.description: Persists the current list of favorite menu item IDs to storage.

methods.name: publish
methods.description: Updates LiveData objects with the latest favorite IDs.
